Section.Catchline: Health studios; powers and duties of the department.

Subsection.Text: The department may, at any time during business hours, enter any business location of a health studio required to be registered pursuant to ss. 501.012-501.019, examine the books or records of the health studio, and subpoena all necessary records when the department has reason to believe a violation of the provisions of ss. 501.012-501.019 has occurred.
The department has the authority to adopt rules pursuant to ss. 120.536(1) and 120.54 to implement ss. 501.012-501.019.

Paragraph.Text: Provide each business location of a health studio with a registration number at the time of registration.
Provide a certificate of registration which prominently displays the registration number.
Place all fees and fines collected pursuant to ss. 501.012-501.019 in the General Inspection Trust Fund of Florida as created in s. 570.20.
